docs.text: Zypher UI Library Documentation Authors xTheAlex14 Source Code If you want the source code, it is here. Basic Usage local library = loadstring ( game : HttpGet ( "https://zypher.wtf/UI-Lib" ))() Create The GUI Window local Main = library : CreateMain ({ -- Required projName = "UILib" , -- The name for the UI in game.CoreGui, not the GUI itself. -- Optional Resizable = true , -- Requires MinSize and MaxSize MinSize = UDim2 . new ( 0 , 400 , 0 , 400 ), MaxSize = UDim2 . new ( 0 , 750 , 0 , 500 ) }) Categories and Sections -- A category is a tab local Category = Main : CreateCategory ( "Category" ) -- Self explanatory local Section = Category : CreateSection ( "Section" )
docs.title: Basics

docs.text: If you want the source code, it is here.
docs.title: Source Code

docs.text: local Main = library : CreateMain ({ -- Required projName = "UILib" , -- The name for the UI in game.CoreGui, not the GUI itself. -- Optional Resizable = true , -- Requires MinSize and MaxSize MinSize = UDim2 . new ( 0 , 400 , 0 , 400 ), MaxSize = UDim2 . new ( 0 , 750 , 0 , 500 ) })
docs.title: Create The GUI Window

docs.text: -- A category is a tab local Category = Main : CreateCategory ( "Category" ) -- Self explanatory local Section = Category : CreateSection ( "Section" )
docs.title: Categories and Sections

docs.text: Interactables Button, Toggle, Slider, Textlabel, Textbox, Dropdown, Keybind, Colorpicker Creating Interactables All interactables use the same function to make them. Section : Create ( "Button" , -- Interactable type "Button" , -- The name of the interactable function ( v ) -- Put v in if the interactable type returns a value -- Callback end , { -- Options } ) Button A simple button local Btn = Section : Create ( "Button" , "Button" , -- The name of the button function () -- Callback print ( 'Button pressed!' ) end , { -- Optional animated = true -- Default: false } ) You can modify the button's text Btn : SetButtonText ( "This changes the button text!" ) Toggle A on/off switch local Toggle = Section : Create ( "Toggle" , "Toggle" , -- The name of the toggle function ( v ) -- Callback print ( v ) -- State of the toggle end , { -- Required default = true -- Default state } ) You can change the toggle's state Toggle : ChangeState ( true ) -- state Slider A slippery value selector Section : Create ( "Slider" , "Slider" , -- The name of the slider function ( v ) -- Callback print ( v ) -- Value of the slider end , { -- Required min = 0 , -- Smallest value on the slider max = 128 , -- Largest value on the slider -- Optional default = 2 , precise = true , -- Whether to do decimal values changeablevalue = false -- Should the slider be changeable } ) Textbox A text input Section : Create ( "Textbox" , "Textbox" , -- The name of the textbox function ( v ) -- Callback print ( v ) -- Text in the textbox end , { -- Optional text = "This is optional" } ) Keybind Bind a function to a key. A list of keycodes can be found here Section : Create ( "Keybind" , "Keybind" , -- The name of the keybind function () -- Callback print ( 'Key pressed!' ) end , { -- Optional default = Enum . KeyCode . X } ) Dropdown For listing things that can be chosen from, or just listing things local Drop = Section : Create ( "Dropdown" , "Dropdown" , -- The name of the dropdown function ( v ) -- Callback print ( v ) -- Option selected end , { -- Required options = { "Apples" , "Bananas" , "Pears" }, -- Optional default = "Apples" search = true -- Allows for searching through the dropdown, useful for large arrays of values } ) Dropdown list options can be changed Drop : SetDropDownList ({ "opt1" , "opt2" , "etc" }) Color Picker Pick a color! locl Picker = Section : Create ( "Colorpicker" , "Color picker" , -- The name of the color picker function ( color ) -- Callback print ( color ) -- Color3 Value end , { -- Optional default = Color3 . fromRGB ( 255 , 255 , 255 ) } ) You can also set the color of the color picker Picker : SetColor ( Color ) Textlabel Well, a label local Text = Section : Create ( "Textlabel" , "Textlabel" -- The text for the label ) You can change the text of the label Text : SetText ( "abc" )
docs.title: Interactables

docs.text: Button, Toggle, Slider, Textlabel, Textbox, Dropdown, Keybind, Colorpicker
docs.title: Interactables

docs.text: All interactables use the same function to make them. Section : Create ( "Button" , -- Interactable type "Button" , -- The name of the interactable function ( v ) -- Put v in if the interactable type returns a value -- Callback end , { -- Options } )
docs.title: Creating Interactables

docs.text: A simple button local Btn = Section : Create ( "Button" , "Button" , -- The name of the button function () -- Callback print ( 'Button pressed!' ) end , { -- Optional animated = true -- Default: false } ) You can modify the button's text Btn : SetButtonText ( "This changes the button text!" )
docs.title: Button

docs.text: A on/off switch local Toggle = Section : Create ( "Toggle" , "Toggle" , -- The name of the toggle function ( v ) -- Callback print ( v ) -- State of the toggle end , { -- Required default = true -- Default state } ) You can change the toggle's state Toggle : ChangeState ( true ) -- state
docs.title: Toggle

docs.text: A slippery value selector Section : Create ( "Slider" , "Slider" , -- The name of the slider function ( v ) -- Callback print ( v ) -- Value of the slider end , { -- Required min = 0 , -- Smallest value on the slider max = 128 , -- Largest value on the slider -- Optional default = 2 , precise = true , -- Whether to do decimal values changeablevalue = false -- Should the slider be changeable } )
docs.title: Slider

docs.text: A text input Section : Create ( "Textbox" , "Textbox" , -- The name of the textbox function ( v ) -- Callback print ( v ) -- Text in the textbox end , { -- Optional text = "This is optional" } )
docs.title: Textbox

docs.text: Bind a function to a key. A list of keycodes can be found here Section : Create ( "Keybind" , "Keybind" , -- The name of the keybind function () -- Callback print ( 'Key pressed!' ) end , { -- Optional default = Enum . KeyCode . X } )
docs.title: Keybind

docs.text: For listing things that can be chosen from, or just listing things local Drop = Section : Create ( "Dropdown" , "Dropdown" , -- The name of the dropdown function ( v ) -- Callback print ( v ) -- Option selected end , { -- Required options = { "Apples" , "Bananas" , "Pears" }, -- Optional default = "Apples" search = true -- Allows for searching through the dropdown, useful for large arrays of values } ) Dropdown list options can be changed Drop : SetDropDownList ({ "opt1" , "opt2" , "etc" })
docs.title: Dropdown

docs.text: Pick a color! locl Picker = Section : Create ( "Colorpicker" , "Color picker" , -- The name of the color picker function ( color ) -- Callback print ( color ) -- Color3 Value end , { -- Optional default = Color3 . fromRGB ( 255 , 255 , 255 ) } ) You can also set the color of the color picker Picker : SetColor ( Color )
docs.title: Color Picker

docs.text: Well, a label local Text = Section : Create ( "Textlabel" , "Textlabel" -- The text for the label ) You can change the text of the label Text : SetText ( "abc" )
docs.title: Textlabel
